DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate high-intensity resistance training induce additional beneficial effect , patient moderate severe long term pain low back , add multidisciplinary treatment program .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Resistance Training Pain , Function Work Ability Patients With Moderate Severe Low Back Pain
DOC.criteria: Referred multidisciplinary clinic treatment pain low back Long term ( ≥ 3months ) recurrent ( ≥ 2 period ≥ 4 week past year ) nonspecific low back pain Pain intensity ≥ 4 numerical rating scale ( 010 ) Severe somatic condition ( unstable injury , malignity , infectious disease , active rheumatic disease , severe osteoporosis ) Psychiatric condition/disease severely impairs group function Insufficient comprehension Norwegian language participate group session fill questionnaire Awaiting surgery back Alcohol drug abuse Ongoing compensation case apply disability benefit due pain back Engaged highintensity resistance training regular basis last 6 month
